channel.title: How do I add a ToolBar into my client? (pic included)
channel.description:
Ok, so I have recently begun on my client. Although, now I would like to add a toolbar, I just simply can't figure out how. This is a simple picture of [i]about[/i] what I want, and If you could help me edit it and things, to get the best of it.
[img]http://i36.tinypic.com/2prz1jt.jpg[/img]
Thanks :D and I guess I would need to know HOW to make a screenshot work...etc..etc..

item.title: How do I add a ToolBar into my client? (pic included)
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Those “codes” don’t go anywhere. They just teach you how to initialize a frame, menu, etc. You are on your own for doing the rest.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I add a ToolBar into my client? (pic included)
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

It’s called a JFrame with a JMenuBar.

http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/uiswing/components/frame.html
and
http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/uiswing/components/menu.html

you might also want to look at JButtons… (Here)

Hell, why not take the list of most swing components.

http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/ui/features/components.html

Read full topic
